messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the criteria for a successful attack roll in a firearms scenario?
If the attack roll is successful: half of the shots fired hit the target—roll damage for half of the shots (round down, minimum of one).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result when the attack is an Extreme success?
all shots fired hit the target, the first half (round down, minimum of one) of which impale.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do you determine the damage for a successful attack roll?
roll damage for half of the shots (round down, minimum of one)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a successful hit in an Extreme difficulty level?
the best possible result is a successful hit and not an impale.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the attack is successful but not an Extreme success?
half of the shots fired hit the target—roll damage for half of the shots (round down, minimum of one).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the best possible result for an Extreme difficulty level shot in a firearm attack?
a successful hit and not an impale.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when an attack roll result is equal to or higher than the firing weapon's malfunction number?
the weapon malfunctions and does not fire.

Damage is sustained each round thereafter until death or until the victim is able to breathe

What is the effect of a roll equal to or less than one-fifth of CON on damage from poisons?
Poisons may cause damage to be halved.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What symptoms may poisons cause in victims?
stomach pains, vomiting, diarrhea, chills, sweats, cramps, jaundice, altered heart rate, impaired vision, convulsions, unconsciousness and paralysis.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do Keepers determine if a victim can act or not due to poison symptoms?
It is up to the Keeper whether the symptoms permit the victim to act or not, or to act with a penalty die or an increased level of difficulty.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what condition can a poison's effects be shaken off?
If the CON roll is a critical success.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are characters ordered in a combat situation?
Highest DEX, Readied Firearms go first.
